article_node.title: War-weary Ukraine skeptical of summit as Russia advances on battlefield, spreads chaos in Europe
article_node.summary: Russia's recent military advances in Ukraine and its sabotage efforts across Europe are raising concerns ahead of President Trump's summit with Vladimir Putin. Ukrainian citizens express skepticism about the potential for meaningful negotiations, with many prioritizing the preservation of military lives over territorial integrity. Meanwhile, reports indicate a surge in Russian hybrid operations targeting Western nations, with a significant increase in sabotage incidents linked to Russian intelligence services.
